message.body: Hey does anyone feel like going out tonight? It's Staci (my old boss)'s birthday and she invited me to go out tonight. She asked me to bring friends. They're going to Buffalo Billiards and National Mechanics. Taryn will be there too
Est√° bien, Jenny. Have fun too
It's 8:30 at Staci's on 2nd and chestnut. Then 10 at buffalo billiards
She didn't give a time for that. I think it's whenever t hey get tired of Buffalo Billiards
But I don't know if we'll be going to national mechanics. It depends on the time
No we're still at Staci's actually. We didnt even get to Buffalo Billiards
We just left Staci's apartment. They're not doing buffalo billiards. Were not going with them to national mechanics
Well if you still want to party, come to The Plough!
I can't keep my eyes open. But thanks. Have fun
